title: Ranked team "Anbu Black Ops"! *RECRUITING*
body:
Team Name: Anbu Black Ops
Status: Currently Recruiting (Comment roles/solo queue ranking/champions, or add/pm "Nemo"

We are looking for highly dedicated players, available most days and times. We are looking for serious players who are ready to try their best and climb the ranked 5's ladder! Preferably looking for Australian players, how ever NZ will also be accepted. Voice communication will be required, either through Skype or Talk.gg. No toxic players, we are looking for a team who will support one another regardless of the outcome, flaming and raging will not be tolerated.

Feel free to ask questions in the comments, or add and private message "Nemo" OCE Server (obviously).

Since we are a serious ranked team, we will be creating a schedule for games, and team meetings. Please fill out the application below in the comments:

In Game Name:
Age:
Main Role:
Main Champion:
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking:
Forms or voice communication:
Times and Days available through out the week:
What days and hours suit you best:
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience:

WE RECOMMEND HIGH GOLD-PLATINUM (SOLO/DUO QUEUE) MOST LIKELY WE WILL NOT BE ACCEPTING ANYONE BELOW GOLD-PLATINUM!!

replies.body:
In Game Name: Niftty, Now you see me

Age: 18

Main Role:  Middle

Main Champion:  Syndra, Ori

CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Diamond 4, still climbing (64% winrate)

Forms or voice communication: Skype, Phone

Times and Days available through out the week: Weekends mainly

What days and hours suit you best: Sat, Sunday (Until after exams, which after i will be available every day)

Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I am currently undertaking year 12 VCE, as a result my playing time is somewhat restricted until early November. If you are interested in a sub for mid lane, i'd be more than happy to play on weekends and occasional weekday nights.

In Game Name: Zupsabao
Age: 24
Main Role: Mid
Main Champion: Anivia
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Plat V
Forms or voice communication: curse/skype/teamspeak
Times and Days available through out the week: nearly all hours at the moment.
What days and hours suit you best: "

Sounds great to me man, I like the most times available, that's hard to find, will contact you on the game itself for a conversation,

-Nemo
okay awesome, sent you a friend request

In Game Name: FC BardNation
Age: 15
Main Role: ADC/JG
Main Champion: Vayne/Rengar
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Platinum 4
Forms or voice communication: Skype
Times and Days available through out the week: Any day
What days and hours suit you best: 4pm onwards
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: From NZ, wanting to join a professional team to start earning an income from league and will provide as much time as i need to as my school supports me in my career path. Climbed from Bronze 3 at the start of the season and i stream regularly [twitch.tv/ltkenigma ](http://twitch.tv/ltkenigma) watch a  lot of LCS and started early season 4.

You sound like someone I would highly consider recruiting, I really like your attitude and goals in regards to the game as a whole, I will contact you on the game itself for a conversation.

-Nemo

JG Main (not v good in other roles) / IGN: Mattsherona / Fav Champs: Yi, Xin
http://plays.tv/u/Mattsherona
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=mattsherona

IGN: Drypanties
Age: 16
Main role: MID
Main Champ; All champs i have in my pool
Rank: G3
Coms: Skype,TS
Avability: mon,thurs,fri,sat,sun all after 5pm besides weekends
About: In selective Highschool , started in s3

In Game Name: Danyku
Age: 17
Main Role: support>adc
Main Champion: thresh, janna, ashe, jinx, tristana, draven
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: platinum 3
Forms or voice communication: skype, teamspeak, can download others
Times and Days available through out the week: Around school hours, I'm free most of the time.
What days and hours suit you best: Friday and Saturday
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I am always looking to get better at the game and improving my skills. Been playing since season 1 and and planning to continue playing for a long time.

In Game Name: MightyDuck2
Age: 18
Main Role: ADC
Main Champion: Kalista
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Silver 3 (Was Gold last Season)
Forms or voice communication: Anything and Everything
Times and Days available through out the week: I am available pretty much most of the time.
What days and hours suit you best: Ummm Whenever really, just depends on what time for scrims and meetings would be :D
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I am a pretty laid back bloke, have been playing League since season 1 but just dont really play ranked all to often (due to trolls and stuff) I wanna start streaming when i can, just need a good recorder. Wanna try and make it into the OPL. Thats my dream, to be a professional gamer. If this team is willing to dedicate a lot of time and work at climbing, I will want to be there every step of the way. Im willing to put in all my time. 

Thanks for having a read, I hope my rank isnt an issue, i have the game smarts and everything to play in a good high elo team, i just keep getting held back due to my rank.

Cheers MightyDuck2

IGN: 420 booty wizard
Age: 24
Main Role: ADC/Mid
Main Champs: Azir/Sivir
Current Solo Q: Plat V
Forms of voice com: Skype
Times and days available: Currently any time, any day.
What days and hours suit you best: Same as above.
Reasonable amount about yourself, and your LoL experience: Freshly discharged after six years service in the ADF and have nothing but time to dedicate to LoL. Comfortable in the top lane, but feel at home as a mid laner or ADC. I am comfortable on all the meta picks for mid (and a bunch of not so meta champs too) as well as all the AD carries. If you are interested in someone that is able, and willing to be dedicated to climbing the ladder and always looking to improve, then add me and we'll chat! Thanks!

In Game Name: projectize

age: 21

main role: support

Main Champs: Thresh, Leona, Nami, Blitz

Current Solo/Duo Queue: Was Gold 1 last season but I've rejoined Lol and I'm currently unranked but playing with high gold low plat in my placements which I've won 7/8 atm

Form of communication: all is good but usually skype

Times and Days available throughout the week: Weekdays usually at night after 6pm  but I am flexible so not really a problem and all day weekends

What days and hours suit you best: Weekdays usually at night after 6pm or Mondays all day

Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I am currently playing Lol trying to rank up and have been studying the game but as I know its easier and faster to improve with a group of mates that share similar ambitions. Thank You!

In Game Name: Tung
Age: 19
Main Role: Mid / Top / Jg
Main Champion: Lee, Fizz, Yasuo (changes over time)
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: D4
Forms or voice communication: Skype / Ts3 / Vent / Mumble
Times and Days available through out the week: All weekdays (6pm onwards) Sat and Sun (All day)
What days and hours suit you best: All weekdays (6pm onwards) Sat and Sun (All day)
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: 
- Studying commerce at Uni
- Played other games like FFXIV, GW2, CS:GO, and enjoy random single player games
- Played LoL since season 1
- Played in ranked teams that consisted of mainly friends
- Played in a few ranked teams from previous LFG chat rooms in-client
- I play to improve both mechanically and strategically

In Game Name: BigDogTim
Age: 15
Main Role: ADC 
Main Champion: Kalista, Corki, Jinx, Vayne 
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Gold 3 promos to Gold 2
Forms or voice communication: Skype
Times and Days available through out the week: all days 
What days and hours suit you best: Monday to Thursday: After 4:30 Friday After 8:30 Saturday-Sunday: Usually free
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: Playing since S1, lots of experience with teams and I know what to do in certain situations. Really looking for a team to play with and get better with, I love team play!

In Game Name: Izou
Age: 18
Main Role: mid/adc but want a role for 5's I can just ham on to be good at it
Main Champion: ahri, jinx
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: gold 2 (climbing to plat fast was silver last week)
Forms or voice communication: ts3, skype
Times and Days available through out the week: all days of week, 5-10pm NZ
What days and hours suit you best: weekdays 5-10pm nz Friday 9pm-when ever, saterday all day
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: Been playing since season 2, had my own team last year that finished the year in promos to plat (climbed from silver 2), enjoy league but ama  sporty person my seld, i play rugby and basketball and softball. Open friendly guy, chill ass and always keen on making new mates

In Game Name: Rocka

Age: 19

Main Role: Jungle/support

Main Champion: Zac, rek'sai and thresh

CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Platinum 3

Forms or voice communication: Skype, teamspeak and cursevoice

Times and Days available through out the week: available most days from 6:30 onwards

What days and hours suit you best: everyday but saturday if i am working

Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I am a uni student currently studying Game development. I have played LOL for about 3 years now and watch alot of LCS games to help myself improve.

In Game Name: Ryuko
Age: 24
Main Role: ADC
Main Champion: sivir
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Gold 2
Forms or voice communication: Skype, Ts, Vent
Times and Days available through out the week: 24/7
What days and hours suit you best: any
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: first season in oce started in s3 na season 4 na. mained support s3 plat. spend a lot of time on this game and wanting to push higher elo. good personality get along with all types serious about 5's.

In Game Name:
Age: i am a Legend 12
Main Role: support
Main Champion: Morgana - thresh  
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: silver 3
Forms or voice communication: curse, TS and Skype 
Times and Days available through out the week: everyday from 5 pm to 9 pm
What days and hours suit you best: everyday 
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: i have been playing lol 2 years  ago i was in NA my rank gold 1 , but i start new account here and also i would to join a rank team i hope you accept me thanks

In Game Name: Get Litt Up
Age: 24
Main Role: Mid/Top
Main Champion: Orianna/Xerath/Malphite/Vlad
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Plat 5
Forms or voice communication: Skype
Times and Days available through out the week: available everynight after 6, and during the day varies with uni. 
What days and hours suit you best: Night time or afternoons on the weekends
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience:

Been playing league since season 3, always watching NA and EU lcs and late night streamers like NB3 and IMATPIE to learn tricks and tips to improve. season 3 i was bronze last season i was silver and now so far im plat 5 hoping to reach diamond by end of the season :)

Sounds good to me man, I heard Vex was already talking with you about recruitment, good to see that you've taken the initiative to come and complete the forum Q&A :D Will add you and contact you on the game itself for a further conversation.

-Nemo

In Game Name: Xuzhinhen

Age: 21

Main Role: ADC/Mid

Main Champion: Twitch/Orianna

CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Plat V

Forms or voice communication: All

Times and Days available through out the week: All

What days and hours suit you best: 4pm onwards

Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: I run my own business but can take time out of that to work with a team. I am looking to play professionally and will commit as much time as needed with a team to get there. I was diamond but decayed due to inactivity, so looking to get back into it.

Your "about yourself" section sounds great, I like individuals with that goal of one day playing professionally, I will highly consider you, and will contact you on the game for a further conversation.

-Nemo

In Game Name: Pagoe
Age: 22
Main Role: mid
Main Champion: Kat/Vlad mainly assassins
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Gold 5
Forms or voice communication: skype
Times and Days available through out the week: every day besides maybe monday during the night and sometimes during the day
What days and hours suit you best: night time and just sorta whenever on weekends
Reasonable amount about yourself, and you LoL experience: started sorta mid season 4 i believe, i play it casual not like my life depends on winning, just something i play when i don't feel like playing the other game i have.

i absolutely love the team name! my summoner name on my main account is Itachi Uchiha who was actually part of the Anbu Black Ops haha. unfortunately tho cos of uni I'm too unreliable and don't have Skype or any of that haha but good luck tho! :)
